category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 12 (Environmental Rights Guarantee)
contents: Article 12 (Environmental Rights Guarantee) ① The Sports Association strives to preserve the environment and support sustainable development plans in accordance with the holding of domestic sports events. ② The Sports Council establishes and maintains an environmental management system and continuously discloses related information internally and externally. [Moved from Article 7, previous Article 12 moved to Article 7 2019. 11. 7.]
